name: Tp Mouse
description:
You controll a little Mouse who needs to evade enemys by teleporting to the white Arrow. This Game was created for the GDQ game-jam. For the art i used the 1bitplattformerpack by Kenny.nl. For the music i used the audio from Kris Kirk.

Move Arrow up: W

Move Arrow down:  S

Move Arrow right: D

Move Arrow left : A

Teleport to Arrow: Space
